column1: Hannar was one of the four Dwarves that stayed at Bag End after Bilbo Baggins birthday party.
In the early writings of the chapter "A Long-expected Party"
column2: Hannar was given some dialogue and a bit more development.  However
column3: J.R.R. Tolkien later changed his mind
column4: and did not disclose his name in the book nor gave him any dialogue.

column1: Hanarr and Hannarr are dwarfs from the Völuspá. Both their names mean "Skilled".Chester Nathan Gould
column2: "Dwarf-Names: A Study in Old Icelandic Religion"
column3: published in Publications of the Modern Language Association of America
